CHAT.comment: child teaches mother to make a small figure jump up and down three times and then sit on a miniature park bench.
child teaches mother to make a figure jump over a small figure , run around a larger figure and then sit on the bench.

u.a: while child does this there is a great deal of commotion in the room; little brother screams , people come in and out , and all finally gets quiet . Child is basically ignored until Mom asks child what she has to do .

CHAT.comment: child teaches mother to string beads; first a round bead and then a square one.
